front.title:
Use of Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) and Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) for Conference Floor Control
Protocol (SOAP) for Conference Floor Control

abstract.t: During a conference, floor control coordinates simultaneous access toshared resource in multimedia conferences. Floor control allowsapplications and users to gain safe and mutually exclusive or non-exclusive access to the shared resources. This document defines anapproach of using Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) eventnotification mechanism and Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) toperform floor control.
